trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around May 17th 2008
Summary: Unusual lights in sky moving in undulating repetitive pattern
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my backyard in SE Denver at 10 pm, taking a photo of the moon. I saw a dozen balls of light in the sky converging into a center point, pulsating outward and retracting back to center. This went on for over an hour. There were two searchlights on the distant northern and southern horizons but I was uncertain if they could have caused this detailed pattern of light for such a prolonged period. The light reflected off clouds. I've seen searchlights before but never this unusual pattern of light expanding and retracting. The sensation I had was that this was highly unusual. (I've seen UFOs before - seven clearly visible disks at Mt. Shasta CA)
